resources.string: Where would you like to depart from?
Where would you like to return this bike?
When you arrive, use the QR SCANNER to scan the code located on a dock (with a bike docked in it!)
Before you start cycling, please RESERVE A DOCK at your destination. This helps lower the chances of you (and others) arriving at a full station.
Please choose where you want to return this bike. If you aren\'t sure yet, come back and update us when you decide!
"That's fine. Please come back and update us when you decide! (Just re-select 'YES' for the response above \u261D\u261D)"
"That's great! Will you be directly travelling there? If so, we can help you estimate the arrival time."
"Use the slider to adjust how long you\'ll be borrowing the bike for. If you're not sure, just set it at the max."
When you arrive at your destination, just slot this bike in at any available dock. If there aren\'t any spare docks, wait a couple minutes before heading off to another station!
